detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Two-button jacket in woven fabric with a fake chest pocket, patch front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Waistcoat in twill made from a viscose blend with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Waistcoat in twill made from a viscose blend with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Waistcoat in twill made from a viscose blend with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a grandad collar and buttons down the front and a fake jetted pocket at the top. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a grandad collar and buttons down the front and a fake jetted pocket at the top. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.

Set with an Alice band and wings. Satin-covered Alice band decorated with fabric flowers, ears and a padded, shimmering unicorn horn. Slightly transparent wings with a glitter print and satin-covered elastic shoulder straps. The wings are edged in faux fur.
Printed satin dance shoes with appliqués, elastication around the openings and elastic straps at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Leotard in glossy jersey with a print motif on the front, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist, a lined gusset and a layered tulle skirt.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with a concealed button at the top. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with a concealed button at the top. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim at the top of the back.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lined cups with removable inserts, narrow, double shoulder straps and a racer back in ventilating mesh. Wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.

Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a high waist.
Fully lined bikini top with lightly padded cups, decorative straps at the front, wide shoulder straps for good support and a plastic fastener at the back.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a coated finish, contrasting colour zips and a detachable, pile-lined hood. Stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front, zipped front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Pile lining.
Fully lined swimsuit with lightly padded cups and a V-neck with frill trims that continue over the shoulders. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Set in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with lapped shoulders. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet. Long-sleeved bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas with press-studs down the front and legs, and full feet. Hat with a ribbed hem.
